title: Dirty Boy
description: Recipe: 1 Porn Star, 1 Step Sister, 1 Wealthy Father, 1 Flighty StepmotherTake one trust fund baby porn star, a stepsister in need of money, and a wealthy father the flighty stepmother stole from. Add in a lot of sex, a huge dose of tragedy, a load of betrayal, a pinch of revenge and a heap of arrogance. Mix them together and shake shit up for a few weeks.The result?One VERY Dirty Boy.
author: Kathryn C. Kelly
